body.name: Newbealer Steam Mop & Detachable Handheld Cleaner, 250ml 1200W Powerful Floor Steamer, 3 Adjustable Levels for Carpet Laminate Hardwood Grout, with Carpet Glider, 7 Multi-purpose Accessories & 2 Pads
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 6 mins
features: [All in 1 Steam Mop and Handheld Steamer] Get ready for a versatile cleaning experience with this all-in-one steam mop! The high performance of efficient microfiber pads and the non-slip carpet glider attachment allows for easy removal of stubborn stains from sealed hard floors and refreshing carpets. It's detachable handheld cleaner and attachments conveniently allow you to target hard-to-reach areas for a thorough cleaning experience.

[Powerful Steam Cleaning] With 3 adjustable steam modes, the intensity of steam is easily controlled. This device is equipped with a powerful 1200W steamer, heating up in just 20 seconds, and reaching temperatures of up to 248℉ - allowing for quick and effective conversion of water to steam to thoroughly blast away dirt, grime, grease and tough stains on various indoor and outdoor surfaces. NOTE: Designed for 110~125-volt outlets only.

[Large Water Tank & Versatile Attachments] Featuring an 8.5 fl oz (250ml) water tank, this steam mop provides up to 10-25 minutes of continuous cleaning time, perfect for a variety of cleaning needs, beyond just floors and carpets. Equipped with versatile attachments, this steamer simplifies cleaning tasks for windows, grout, furniture, and even your vehicle's interior and exterior! With the power of steam alone, it's safe for use around children and pets.

[Lightweight & Convenient] Crafted from lightweight yet sturdy plastic and featuring a slim design, this steam mop weighs just 3.96lb, making it effortless to handle. The swivel steering mop head, along with the extended poles and an extra-long power cord measuring 16 feet, enables you to effortlessly clean hard-to-reach areas. Additionally, it can be conveniently stored in any corner of your home.

[Comprehensive Package Contents] This package includes everything you need for a comprehensive cleaning journey: a handheld pod, 2 extension poles, mop head, carpet glider, 2 washable microfiber pads, 2 nylon brushes, brass brush, squeegee, triangle brush, steam jet nozzle, gap brush, and a water fill flask. Plus, we offer a one-year warranty, along with professional and friendly customer support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powerful All-in-One Steam Cleaner and Mop To Be Handheld Steam Cleaner: It could be as a portable steam cleaner to clean multiple areas in your home, such as kitchen and bathroom sinks, countertops, stovetops, microwave ovens, oven grates, refrigerators, windows, and pet and children's toys. To Be A Steam Mop: It is also a steam mop to clean a variety of sealed hard floors with high-temperature steam such as hardwood, tiles, linoleum, granite, and marble. Plus, the included Glider Accessory makes it a highly effective carpet cleaner.

One-hand Operation Short press to switch to different steams. Long press the button to turn it off. -NOTE: Always unplug asap after each use to avoid overheating. Safe and Easy Refilling Easily fill it with the included measuring cup. Only use pure water - Chemical-free cleaning makes children and pets safe. Powerful HighTemperature Steam Power 1200W heats up to over 248℉ in 20 seconds to blast away dirt, grime, grease, stains, and across a wide variety of indoor and outdoor surfaces. Carpet Refreshing with Ease Effortlessly remove odors and refresh your carpet with our carpet glider! Just attach the pad to the mop head, place it on the glider, and Go!

Specifications: Power: 120V, 60Hz, 1200W Steam Temperature: 248℉ (120℃) Water Tank Capacity: 8.45 oz (250ml) Rapid Steam: 20 seconds Working Time: 10-25mins Power Cord Length: 16 ft Product Size and Weight: 11.8" x 5.5" x 43.3", 3.96 lb Package Size: 17*8.5*7.6 in Replacement Pads (6pcs) just search B0BX2ZZ331 Replacement Accessories (7pcs) just search B0C9LDRRYQ Replacement Carpet Glider just search B0C3LMHWTB

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The steamer is amazing! It has several attachments. Easy to assemble and clean very well on all types of surfaces just add some water plug it in and steam away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and works just as well
reviews.reviewText: Love the design, weight and functionality. Also love that they gave us a tiny water spout to pour water into the machine. Great purchase, especially for non toxic homes!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cleans well but had issues
reviews.reviewText: The steam vac is very cute and works really good . I am Having issues with the head staying “clicked in”. I actually called for a replacement because it won’t stay locked in and comes off. I am Hoping that was just a glitch and the replacement functions properly.The cord is short so I do have to plug in three separate places for my kitchen , dining room and living room - which are all in one open floor space - probably 400 square feet .But for price i think it’s great(As long as the replacement stays together lol)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves tile floors spotless!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this product to mop my tile floors, along with steam clean counter tops and cabinets. This product is great and I love how many different attachment options it has. Ordering additional cleaning pads and cleaning solution is easy and inexpensive. This product has made my weekly cleaning routine significantly easier and leaves my floors leaving clean and fresh. It preheats quickly and is easy to use. The only downfall is I find myself having to unplug and re-plug in the device frequently to clean my entire downstairs. However, this is a minor inconvenience for such a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great steam. Lots of helpful attachments. Super long cord. Easy to put together. Solid and secure. Easy to disassemble and/or change attachments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight and easy to assemble! Easy to use. Great steam production!! I used it first around my stove. I've black porcelain tiles and grease splatters build up quickly. This steamer removed the build up very nicely. Inexpensive yet works like pro machine! It will be used often on my tile and wood floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This actually works
reviews.reviewText: This mops is so easy to use and cleans so well. Cleaned my floors, shower, and windows. So awesome. Only down fall is that the water tank only holds up to 8 FL Oz of water. So, I had to constantly refill the tank. But even refilling the tank is easy, so it really isn't an issue. The vintage color and style is very cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This steam mops works great. It’s very light.tank is a bit small. Other wise it cleans the floors great
